== Outline of computer-janitor-gtk documentation page ==

=== Goal ===
To explain to the user:
# the purpose and benefits of the program, including 
# how to use the program, including explanation of terms like (A file on disk) and (.deb package)
# circumstances when the user may or will want to use the program
# who to contact in case of suggestions or queries
# provide links to related material

=== Scenarios ===
# When the user wants/needs to free up some disk space
# When the user wants/needs to optimise the system performance

=== Proposed Outline ===
# Introduction
# Usage and clarification of UI terminology
# Explanation of possible cases when the program can/should be used.
# Link to program author
# Links to related material
